recommendations.recommendation: So many mixed feelings about Sousei no Onmyouji: its production values are really low (very noticeable on the first 10 episodes) and the plot itself gradually wears thin, but the story and characters have enough potential to keep you roughly interested. My verdict: for fans only.
The story is a bit generic, but the character development is well done and the love story that is shown is really touching. Also the soundtrack and some fight is really great.

anime.description: http://anidb.net/ch78912 [Rokuro] is from a family of exorcists who remove the evil Kegare, but his real dream is to be a singer, a soccer player, or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist name http://anidb.net/ch78911 [Benio] arrives, Rokuro is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists," two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world. Source: ANN

tag.name: shounen
tag.description: In the context of manga and associated media, shounen, literally meaning "youth" and often also specifically "boy", refers to a male audience roughly between the ages of 10 and 18. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: bad cooking
tag.description: The character is hopelessly terrible at cooking, and any attempts he or she makes at making even the simplest dishes are spectacular failures.

tag.name: dynamic
tag.description: Some of the central structural elements in anime are: Plot Continuity How does the plot or several plots unfold. Are they a strictly linear retelling of one big continuing story, a serial, possibly with several side stories, or is the content chopped into a set of unconnected episodes, only sharing the same setting and characters? Stereotype Characters Then there is the question of the character set presentation. Is it completely original, or is it your usual stereotypical character cast. Both choices have their merit, for example it would not really make much sense to reinvent the wheel for a harem anime. Fans of that genre come to expect their favourite stereotype protagonists. Plot Twists Finally there is the question of how complex the plot / the story unfolds. Are there side-plots that merge into the main plot leading to unexpected plot twists, or is the anime quite predictable? The latter would not be appropriate for detective stories. In harem anime on the other hand a foreseeable outcome is actually something the fans will come to expect.

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: calling your attacks
tag.description: "GIGAAAAAA DRIIIIIILLL BREAKEEEEEERRR" If you can do something more impressive than just throw a punch, your attack(s) must have an equally impressive name. More than that, you have to call it out as you launch the attack. It doesn`t matter if it`s a martial arts move, a magical spell or your secret superweapon, if you can`t say its name, it just isn`t nearly as cool or effective. Having a special attack is always a must, but not impressive enough. Every special attack needs a name. A really awesome and outstanding name which is easy to remember and even easier and impressive to yell. Because it just is not enough to name your attack. No, to unleash the full power of your attack, you have to call its name in your most MANLY and LOUDEST voice. It does not matter whether it is a martial arts move, a magical spell or flying drills from your mecha, if you can`t call its name, it just isn`t nearly as cool or effective. Not a requirement but wearing shades while calling your attack makes it at least twice as cool, moreover giving your mecha or magical companion shades too results in an immeasurable level of awesomeness, bringing down every enemy just through the POWER OF YOUR VOICE. A standard feature of practically every mecha, mahou shoujo, high fantasy, or martial arts anime. [Source: TV Tropes]

tag.name: swordplay
tag.description: The act or art of using a sword or similar weapon skillfully.

tag.name: super power
tag.description: Be it an ancient Greek Heracles, a cybernetic muscle-man, or a fourteen year-old girl in a mini-skirted sailor suit. As long as they have super powers, they`re in the show.

tag.name: demon
tag.description: In Western lore, demons are often described as minions from Hell, generally known to attack humans and feast on their flesh or possess the bodies of those with weak souls. In Eastern lore, on the other hand, they are generally supernatural, often but not always malevolent beings who can be more mischievous than actually evil, or simply supernatural spirits of no specific alignment.

tag.name: contemporary fantasy
tag.description: Contemporary fantasy, also known as modern fantasy or indigenous fantasy, is a sub-genre of fantasy, set in the present day. It is perhaps most popular for its sub-genre, urban fantasy. These terms are used to describe stories set in the putative real world (often referred to as consensus reality) in contemporary times, in which magic and magical creatures exist, either living in the interstices of our world or leaking over from alternate worlds. It thus has much in common with, and sometimes overlaps with secret history; a work of fantasy in which the magic could not remain secret or does not have any known relationship to known history would not fit into this subgenre. Occasionally certain contemporary fantasy novels will make reference to pop culture. Novels in which modern characters travel into alternate worlds, and all the magical action takes place there (except for the portal required to transport them), are not considered contemporary fantasy. Thus, C.S. Lewis`s The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe, where all fantasy events take place in the land of Narnia which is reached via a magic wardrobe, would not count as contemporary fantasy; on the other hand, the part of The Magician`s Nephew, where the Empress Jadis gets to London, tries to take over the Earth and clashes with police and a crowd of cockneys, would qualify as such. Contemporary fantasy is also to be distinguished from horror fiction, which also often has contemporary settings. When encountering magical events and creatures, the protagonist of a horror novel is horrified, while the protagonist of a fantasy novel (contemporary or otherwise) is filled with a sense of joy and wonder. Horrifying events may happen, but the fundamental distinction is vital. In his preface to That Hideous Strength, one of the earlier works falling within this sub-genre, C.S. Lewis explained why, when writing a tale about "magicians, devils, pantomime animals and planetary angels", he chose to start it with a detailed depiction of narrow-minded academic politics at a provincial English university and the schemes of crooked real estate developers: "I am following the traditional fairy-tale. We do not always notice its method, because the cottages, castles, woodcutters and petty kings with which a fairy tale opens have become for us as remote as the witches and ogres to which it proceeds. But they were not remote at all to the men who first made and enjoyed the tales". The same is true for many of the later works in the genre, which often begin with a seemingly normal scene of modern daily life to then disclose supernatural and magical beings and events hidden behind the scenes. Source: wiki

tag.name: slapstick
tag.description: Slapstick humour is generally recognized by lots of physical abuse, horseplay and practical jokes. Also often seen are impossible situations, using sounds to illustrate impossible stunts that aren`t shown on-screen and to create tension for audience anticipation.

tag.name: sudden girlfriend appearance
tag.description: Sudden Girlfriend Appearance anime involve a sudden change in the main character`s life where (s)he suddenly gets confronted with an individual (s)he`s sexually attracted to, the two of them inevitably becoming a couple.

tag.name: plot continuity
tag.description: Consistency of the characteristics of persons, plot, objects, places and events seen by the viewer. A single linear focused plot is highly continuous. A truly random plot is highly discontinuous.

tag.name: manga
tag.description: Manga is the lifeblood that drives the anime industry. Everything and its mother is based on manga. However! There are exceptions where the manga was not the basis for the anime. It`s common practice to make manga adaptations of many popular anime, there`s a manga based on Evangelion, and two (one shounen and one shoujo) based on each of Escaflowne and Mahou Tsukai Tai. Also it`s quite common to release manga and anime versions of a story in parallel, for instance Nadesico and Shoujo Kakumei Utena. There are also cases where an anime continues in a manga, as in the case of Angel Beats! and Angel Beats: Heaven`s Door, or reverse. See also http://anidb.net/t6493 [manhua] and http://anidb.net/t5010 [manhwa].

tag.name: action
tag.description: Action anime usually involve a fairly straightforward story of good guys versus bad guys, where most disputes are resolved by using physical force. It often contains a lot of shooting, explosions and fighting.

tag.name: fantasy
tag.description: Fantasy is a genre of fiction that uses magic and other supernatural phenomena as a primary element of plot, theme, or setting. Many works within the genre take place in fictional worlds where magic is common. Fantasy is generally distinguished from science fiction and horror by the expectation that it steers clear of (pseudo-)scientific and macabre themes, respectively, though there is a great deal of overlap between the three (which are subgenres of speculative fiction). In popular culture, the genre of fantasy is dominated by its medievalist form, especially since the worldwide success of The Lord of the Rings books by J. R. R. Tolkien. In its broadest sense however, fantasy comprises works by many writers, artists, filmmakers, and musicians, from ancient myths and legends to many recent works embraced by a wide audience today. Fantasy is a vibrant area of academic study in a number of disciplines (English, cultural studies, comparative literature, history, medieval studies). Work in this area ranges widely, from the structuralist theory of Tzvetan Todorov, which emphasizes the fantastic as a liminal space, to work on the connections (political, historical, literary) between medievalism and popular culture Source: Wiki

tag.name: horror
tag.description: The horror cinematic genre is characterized by the attempt to make the viewer experience dread, fear, terror, or horror. Often their plots involve the intrusion of an evil force, event or personage, sometimes of supernatural origin, on the mundane world and the consequences thereof.

tag.name: comedy
tag.description: Anime whose central struggle causes hilarious results. These stories are built upon funny characters, situations and events. A comedy anime is laced with humour and sets out to provoke laughter from the audience. Japanese humour can be a bit strange to westerners, so if you`re new to this type of humour, just bear with it; it`ll most likely grow on you if you`re a fan of other kinds of comedy.

tag.name: romance
tag.description: Romance describes a story that deals with love between two or more characters typically also having an optimistic ending. Romance is also a difficulty encountered when creating a harem.

tag.name: revenge
tag.description: A primary factor that drives the plot forward, is the almost obsessive desire of one of the characters to get back at someone else.

tag.name: funny expressions
tag.description: The facial expressions of the characters may change so quickly or unexpectedly distort that hilarity will ensue.

tag.name: emotions awaken superpowers
tag.description: During an extreme emotional state — rage, love, hate, angst, sadness, compassion — something inside the character will "click" that will increase greatly his/her power or a new superpower awakes, that surpasses anything achieved by him/her until then.

tag.name: fighting
tag.description: For some reason or other one faction has to take it out on some opponent via fight or battle. Typical examples of this are all the anime with "endless pointless fighting" tag.

tag.name: strong male lead
tag.description: The lead male protagonist in this anime shows backbone, is competent, and does not shy away from seemingly insurmountable objectives.

tag.name: saving the world
tag.description: While villains love to take over the world or cause the end of the world as we know it, the heroes are most likely motivated by the polar opposite, saving the world. A fairly simple plot/motivation related to for great justice and what not, this trope is pretty broad and very common for many stories not focused on character interaction only. Source: TV Trope

tag.name: strong female lead
tag.description: The lead female character has a strong personality and plays a part that is not the typical damsel-in-distress role. This is the exact opposite of the “damsel in distress” tag.

tag.name: walls of text
tag.description: Walls of text refers to Japanese text that appears in large quantities within the anime itself. This text is most likely vital to the storyline and may come in the form of charts and diagrams or pieces of paper, notes or even thoughts that are only partially or entirely unspoken. May also be taken as a fair warning to viewers unable to translate Japanese text on their own, suggesting that thorough subtitle support may be required as well as making use of the pause button on their media players so that all text can be read. Normally, tags don`t refer to physical translations of text, subtitle appearances and karaoke styling added by 3rd parties. But those who seek to describe an anime that is heavy on SPOKEN dialogue (which may tend to create a large quantity of natural subtitling to read for those not fluent in the language being used) could consider this tag but may make clearer reference with the dialogue driven tag.

tag.name: boy meets girl
tag.description: A classical type of plot in story writing, where the story begins with a boy meeting a girl leading to romantic development between the two. More often than not the boy loses the girl later on and has to find her again.

tag.name: time skip
tag.description: The plot features at least one skip or jump in time. Example: A skip from the present into the past, or time skips in increments, e.g. every hour there is a time skip by a day.

tag.name: exorcism
tag.description: Eviction of demons or other spiritual entities from a person or place which they are believed to have possessed.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Adashino Benio
character.description: Adashino Benio became the young heir of the Adashino family after her parents died. Her speciality is astronomy. She likes exorcists, family and ohagi. She hates http://anidb.net/ch81478 [Kamui] and spicy food. She used to be a cheerful girl until her parents were killed, which prompted her to close her heart and train diligently as an exorcist in order to exact vengeance upon http://anidb.net/ch81478 [Kamui]. She initially disliked http://anidb.net/ch78912 [Rokuro] but reconciliated with him after she became aware of her brother`s true nature.

character.name: Enmadou Rokuro
character.description: Enmadou Rokuro is the boy who, together with http://anidb.net/ch78911 [Adashino Benio], was given the title of "Twin Star Exorcist". Rokuro was a gifted exorcist who, while still very young, helped purify Impurites alongside the adults. However, at this time the "Tragedy of Hiinatsuki" occured at his school in which Rokuro was the sole survivor. Ever since that incident he strongly refuses to become an exorcist.

character.name: Ijika Yuuto
character.description: Ijika Yuuto is http://anidb.net/ch78912 [Rokuro]`s childhood friend, as well as http://anidb.net/ch78911 [Benio]`s twin brother. He likes exorcists and ohagi, but dislikes weak exorcists and his sister. Yuuto is also a former disciple of http://anidb.net/ch79725 [Amakawa Seigen]. He is http://anidb.net/ch78912 [Rokuro]`s and http://anidb.net/ch78911 [Benio]`s main antagonist in this series.

character.name: Amawaka Seigen
character.description: Amakawa Seigen is the ninth head of the Amakawa family. He likes sushi. He hates children, anmitsu and television. He is the teacher of http://anidb.net/ch78912 [Rokuro] and http://anidb.net/ch78913 [Yuuto]. He looks like a juvenile boy but he is http://anidb.net/ch79726 [Mayura`s] father. Despite his sharp tongue and distant attitude, he does in fact care strongly for other people.

episode.title: 禍野の音 BOTHERSOME TWOSOME
The Sound of Magano: Bothersome Twosome
Les sons de Magano
Magano`nun Sesi: Sıkıcı Çift
Magano no Oto: Bothersome Twosome
episode.summary: When Ryogo runs into more trouble than expected during a Kegare exorcism, a desperate Rokuro turns to the one person he thinks can really help: Benio. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: すれ違い A HERO`S WORTH
Differing Intentions: A Hero`s Worth
Rencontre manquée
Değişen Amaçlar: Bir Kahramanın Değeri
Surechigai: A Hero`s Worth
episode.summary: Benio quickly becomes the center of attention after transferring to Rokuro and Mayura`s middle school. When a Kegare attacks between classes, Benio decides to leave while Rokuro claims that their studies should take precedence over exorcist duties. But is that how he really feels? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 双星交差 A FATEFUL FIGHT
Intersection of Twin Stars: A Fateful Fight
Le croisement des étoiles jumelles
İkiz Yıldızların Çarpışması: Öldürücü Kavga
Sousei Kousa: A Fateful Fight
episode.summary: Benio has moved into the Seika dormitory, which puts her into conflict with Rokuro after their unpleasant first encounter. Soon a strange individual arrives at the dorm clad only in a pair of underpants. This turns out to be the leader of all exorcists, the Chief Exorcist Tsuchimikado Arima. After inviting the members of the dorm to the Five Mirror Chamber, he asks Rokuro and Benio to battle in front of exorcist authorities from around Japan. Benio wants to test Rokuro`s strength, but he still wants nothing to do with being an exorcist. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命の二人 BOY MEETS GIRL
The Destined Two: Boy Meets Girl
Les deux êtres de la destinée
Kaderleri Birbirine Bağlı İkili: Çocukla Kız Tanışır
Unmei no Futari: Boy Meets Girl
episode.summary: Enmado Rokuro has great talent as an exorcist, but because of trauma in his past he has given that pursuit up. That`s when he meets Adashino Benio, head of the famous Adashino exorcist clan, who has moved to Tokyo from Kyoto. What will become of these two after their fateful meeting? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 1
Opening 1
ろくろの気持ち SHOCKING CONFESSION
Rokuro`s Feelings: Shocking Confession
Les sentiments de Rokuro
Rokuro`nun Hisleri: Şok Edici İtiraf
Rokuro no Kimochi: Shocking Confession
episode.summary: Mayura and Benio debate whether or not Rokuro should continue fighting, and an unpleasant figure from Rokuro`s past arrives to test his renewed dedication to being an exorcist. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たなる試練 UNBELIEVABLE GAME
A New Trial: Unbelievable Game
Une nouvelle épreuve
Yeni Test: İnanılmaz Oyun
Arata Naru Shiren: Unbelievable Game
episode.summary: Arima returns to Tokyo to give the Twin Star Exorcists a trial to test their skills. But it`s not the kind of test they were anticipating, with an unexpected reward. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 紅緒と繭良 GIRLS` PARTY
Benio and Mayura: Girls` Party
Benio et Mayura
Benio ve Mayura: Kızlar Partisi
Benio to Mayura: Girls` Party
episode.summary: With Benio constantly leaving school for no given reason, Mayura starts to worry about her new classmate. And Rokuro starts getting back into the swing of things by joining the others on a regular Kegare exorcism. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 十二天将 朱雀 THE GUARDIAN SHIMON
Twelve Guardians, Vermilion Bird: The Guardian Shimon
Suzaku des douze généraux célestes
On İkili Muhafız, Parlak Kızıl Kuş: Muhafız Shimon
Juuniten Shou Suzaku: The Guardian Shimon
episode.summary: When the kids from an elementary school soccer team are suddenly transported to Magano by Kegare, Rokuro joins Benio, Atsushi, and Shinnosuke to go to Magano and save them. But in the middle of the battle, painful memories overwhelm Rokuro, and he`s unable to fight. Just then, one of the highest ranking Exorcists, the "Vermilion Bird" of the Twelve Guardians, Ikaruga Shimon, appears. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 勘弁しろし BASARA BOY KAMUI
Give Me a Break: Basara Boy Kamui
Fous-moi la paix
Beni Rahat Bırakın: Basaralı Çocuk Kamui
Kanben Shiroshi: Basara Boy Kamui
episode.summary: Benio and Rokuro square off against the massively powerful Kamui, but are hopelessly outmatched. What makes this Kegare so uniquely dangerous? And can the Twin Star Exorcists survive? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新婚さんおきばりやす FANTASTIC MOMENTS
Do Your Best, Newlyweds: Fantastic Moments
Au boulot, jeunes mariés
Beni Rahat Bırakın: Basaralı Çocuk Kamui
Shinkon-san Okibari Yasu: Fantastic Moments
episode.summary: Subaru of the Twelve Guardians thinks that Benio and Rokuro need to understand each other better, but the Twin Star Exorcists aren`t convinced and insist on conventional combat training. The debate comes to head in the form of a game of hide and seek: if Benio and Rokuro can track Subaru down before sunset, she`ll provide the training they`re asking for. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: すばるの修行 THE BEWITCHING GUARDIAN
Subaru`s Training: The Bewitching Guardian
L`entraînement de Subaru
En İyisini Yapın, Yeni Evliler: Fantastik Anlar
Subaru no Shugyou: The Bewitching Guardian
episode.summary: After being confronted by Yuuto, the Twin Star Exorcists are desperate to get stronger in preparation for future battles, but Benio`s old master Subaru has a different kind of training in mind. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 交錯する悲劇 TRAGEDY COMES WITH SMILE
Intertwining Tragedies: Tragedy Comes with Smile
Drames entremêlés
İç İçe Geçmiş Felaket: Gülümsemeyle Gelen Felaket
Kousaku Suru Higeki: Tragedy Comes with Smile
episode.summary: With the truth about Rokuro exposed to Benio, the Twin Star Exorcists are confronted by someone who shares a connection to both of them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 君の勇気, 私の勇気 ZERO MILLIMETERS APART
Your Courage, My Courage: Zero Millimeters Apart
Ton courage, mon courage
Senin Cesaretin, Benim Cesaretim: Sıfır Milimetre Uzakta
Kimi no Yuuki, Watashi no Yuuki: Zero Millimeters Apart
episode.summary: Benio has a vendetta against the incredibly powerful Basara, Kamui. Rokuro tries to reason with her as she insists on fighting him no matter what the cost. Can the Twin Star Exorcists overcome their most deadly enemy yet by working together? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 陰陽師として SALVATION THEN WAILING
As an Exorcist: Salvation Then Wailing
En tant qu`Onmyôji
Onmyouji to Shite: Salvation Then Wailing
episode.summary: After harsh words from Seigen, the Twin Stars are frustrated with how powerless they feel. Mayura decides to help cheer her exorcist friends up, in spite of a warning from her father... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ひとりぼっちに さようなら THE AWAKENING OF LOVE
Goodbye to Being Alone: The Awakening of Love
Adieu solitaire
Yalnız Olmaya Elveda: Aşk Uyanışı
Hitoribocchi ni Sayounara: The Awakening of Love
episode.summary: Ryogo gets introduced to an attractive young exorcist by Fushihara, an exorcist from the neighboring area, causing him to question whether or not exorcists should pursue romantic relationships in face of the otherworldly threats that menace their lives. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 浴衣と星と願い事 TANABATA SPECIAL
Yukatas, Stars, and Wishes: Tanabata Special
Yukata, étoiles et souhaits
Yukata to Hoshi to Negaigoto: Tanabata Special
episode.summary: It`s Tanabata at the Seika Dorm, and everyone is reminiscing while they think about what their wishes for the future will be. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ふたりの道 TO THE FUTURE WITH US TWO
Our Path: To the Future with Us Two
Leur chemin
Futari no Michi: To the Future with Us Two
episode.summary: Yuto has been dominating the Twin Star Exorcists so far, but can help from an unexpected source change the course of their battle? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 罪もけがれも THE 10 SECONDS DECISION
Both Sin and Impurity: The 10 Seconds Decision
Péchés et souillures
Tsumi mo Kegare mo: The 10 Seconds Decision
episode.summary: It`s all been leading up to this. With their new Resonance abilities, the Twin Star Exorcists take the fight directly to Ijika Yuto. Will it be enough to defeat the twisted, evil exorcist? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決戦前夜 TRIUMPH OVER FEAR
On the Eve of Battle: Triumph over Fear
La veille de la bataille finale
Kessen Zen`ya: Triumph over Fear
episode.summary: Rokuro has sworn to defeat Yuto. But... how? The Twin Star Exorcists look at the facts and try to find a way to strengthen their odds against an opponent that outclasses them in nearly every way. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 師がくれた赤い証 NEW TALISMAN FROM MASTER
The Red Emblem Master Gave Me: New Talisman from Master
Le sceau rouge hérité de mon maître
Shi ga Kureta Akai Akashi: New Talisman from Master
episode.summary: Rokuro has sworn to defeat Yuto. But... how? The Twin Star Exorcists look at the facts and try to find a way to strengthen their odds against an opponent that outclasses them in nearly every way. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 2
Opening 2
ケガレの見た夢 WHAT IS BEAUTIFULL?
The Kegare`s Dream: What Is Beautiful?
Le rêve de l`Impur
Kegare no Mita Yume: What Is Beautiful?
episode.summary: The Twin Stars` tour across Japan to seal the Kegare-spawning Dragon Spots makes a detour to an amusement park, and Sae makes a new friend that Benio and Rokuro aren`t happy about. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 双星 西へ HARD TO BE MOTHER
Westward, Twin Stars: Hard to Be Mother
Ô, étoiles jumelles, vers l`ouest !
Sousei Nishi e: Hard to Be Mother
episode.summary: The Twin Stars head out of town to seal a Dragon Spot, and Benio is confronted with the infamy caused by her brother. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ケガれてんじゃ~ん PHILOSOPHICAL FILTHY SERAPHIM
It`s Impure, Y`Know? Philosophical Filthy Seraphim
C`est impur
Kegaretenjan: Philosophical Filthy Seraphim
episode.summary: The hellish world of Magano, home of the Kegare, has begun to leak into our reality. Can the Twin Star Exorcists stop the growing influence before it spells doom for the town of Narukami? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 双星新生 SWEETIE FAIRY
Rebirth of the Twin Stars: Sweetie Fairy
La renaissance des étoiles jumelles
Sousei Shinsei: Sweetie Fairy
episode.summary: Two years have passed since their battle with Yuto, and the Twin Star Exorcists have gotten better with age. But when they find something unexpected in Magano, there`s no telling what it could mean for their future. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天・元・空・我 COME BACK! SOUTHPAW
Celestial Avatar: Come Back! Southpaw
Ciel, origine, vide, ego
Ten Gen Kuu Ware: Come Back! Southpaw
episode.summary: The Twin Stars head down to Nagoya and encounter a baseball stadium that has been taken over by a Basara. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さえとの約束 MISSING EXORCIST MASTER
A Promise with Sae: Missing Exorcist Master
Promesse avec Sae
Sae to no Yakusoku: Missing Exorcist Master
episode.summary: The head of the Exorcist Union is attacked by the Basara responsible for the the Dragon Spots. And the Twin Star Exorcists finally learn just where Sae came from. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鸕宮天馬 TRANSCENDENCE
Unomiya Tenma: Transcendence
Tenma Unomiya
Unomiya Tenma: Transcendence
episode.summary: A Dragon Spot in Kumano results in a brief detour before the Twin Stars and Sae arrive in Kyoto, and they meet the strongest member of the Twelve Guardians. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ひみつの繭良ちゃん MAYURA`S SECRET LESSON
Mayura-chan`s Secret: Mayura`s Secret Lesson
La mystérieuse Mayura
Himitsu no Mayura-chan: Mayura`s Secret Lesson
episode.summary: While the Twin Stars tour Japan, Mayura tries to step up her skills as an exorcist. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 双星VS双生 BASARA TWINS` STRINGS
Twin Stars vs Twins: Basara Twins` Strings
Étoiles jumelles vs jumeaux
Sousei vs Sousei: Basara Twins` Strings
episode.summary: The Twin Star Exorcists meet a pair of twin Basara brothers, whose teamwork might be a match for our heroes` powers... And the mastermind behind the Dragon Spots finally reveals himself. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 混沌の中に SEEKING THE PAST, SEEKING THE FUTURE
Into Chaos: Seeking the Past, Seeking the Future
En plein chaos
Konton no Naka ni: Seeking the Past, Seeking the Future
episode.summary: The Twin Stars reflect on their past, and Rokuro begins to question his own origins. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: そばにいるから WAI WA KINAKO YA!
Because I`m with You: Wai Wa Kinako Ya!
Je serai à vos côtés - Je suis Kinako
Soba ni Iru kara: Wai wa Kinako Ya!
episode.summary: Kinako wakes up alone in the Seika Dorm after the trip to Kyoto. As he searches for Benio, he reminisces about how they first met. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: いつまでも笑顔で LOVELY SMILE FOREVER
Forever Smiling: Lovely Smile Forever
Sourire éternel
Itsumademo Egao de: Lovely Smile Forever
episode.summary: With the secret behind the Dragon Spots and Sae`s origin revealed, the path to salvation is clear. But are the Twin Stars willing to part ways with the girl who`s become like a daughter to them? And if they`re not, can they help the Twelve Guardians resist the flood of Kegare coming through the Dragon Spot? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 守るべきもの WHAT IS REALLY IMPORTANT?
What Must Be Protected: What Is Really Important?
Ce qui doit être protégé
Mamorubeki Mono: What Is Really Important?
episode.summary: Chijiwa has wrapped Shimon, along with the rest of the school, in his marionette strings to force them to attack the Twin Stars. Can Rokuro, Benio, and Mayura find a way to free their friends, or will they be forced to fight? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 復讐の傀儡師 I AM NOT ALONE
The Puppeteer`s Revenge: I Am Not Alone
Le marionnettiste de la vengeance
Fukushuu no Kairaishi: I Am Not Alone
episode.summary: A Basara is targetting the Twin Star Exorcists, and the only one standing in his way is Shimon. But will the winged guardian save Rokuro and Benio, or be their ultimate downfall? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 名コンビじゃねぇ! WACHI vs WASHI&WATASHI
The Greatest Duo?! Wachi vs Washi & Watashi
On est pas la meilleure équipe ! Moro vs Miku et Sakura
Mei Combi ja Nee! Wachi vs Washi & Watashi
episode.summary: Two of the Twelve Guardians, Zeze Miku and Sada Sakura, take on the ravenous Basara named Moro. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 師[もろ]の恩返し I WANT YOU TO EAT ME
The Master Repays a Favor: I Want You to Eat Me
La dette de Moro
Moro no Ongaeshi: I Want You to Eat Me
episode.summary: Kuranashi prepares the next phase of his plan, and sends the Basara who have allied with him to take on the Twelve Guardians. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鳴神町最凶の日 NO WAY TO RUN,NO PLACE TO HIDE
Narukami`s Most Ill-Fated Day: No Way to Run, No Place to Hide
Un jour funeste au quartier Narukami
Narukamimachi Saikyou no Hi: No Way to Run, No Place to Hide
episode.summary: Kuranashi unveils his deadly game, and if the Twin Star Exorcists don`t win, it could mean the death of everyone in the town of Narukami. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恋の町 舞い上がる TELL ME HONEST FEELINGS
Spirits Soaring in the City of Romance: Tell Me Honest Feelings
La ville de l`amour se soulève
Koi no Machi Maiagaru: Tell Me Honest Feelings
episode.summary: It`s the quiet before the storm as the Twin Stars and their friends have a moment of rest before Kuranashi unleashes his plot. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 双星ときめく FINALY THEY KISSED?
Twin Stars` Hearts Dance: Finally They Kissed?
Les étoiles jumelles tressaillent
Sousei Tokimeki: Finally They Kissed?
episode.summary: The Twin Star Exorcists fight the giant Kegare ravaging Narukami while it floats in the sky, as the Twelve Guardians try to make sure the floating city can return to the ground safely. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 慈愛の霊獣 DAUGHTER`S FIGHT! FATHER`S DELIGHT
The Sacred Beast of Love: Daughter`s Fight! Father`s Delight
Le tendre animal totem
Jiai no Reijuu: Daughter`s Fight! Father`s Delight
episode.summary: Mayura and Seigen face off against Kuranashi, but the Basara has a wicked trick up his sleeve. Does the daughter-father team stand a chance against the mastermind of the attack on Narukami? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 愛すれど遠く FAREWELL,MY PRECIOUS
Distanced Despite Their Love: Farewell, My Precious
Un amour lointain
Ai Suredo Tooku: Farewell, My Precious
episode.summary: After learning about his true nature from Arima, and what it could potentially mean for the entire world, Rokuro makes a decision. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 千年の夢 MELANCHOLIC MISANTHROPE
The Millennial Dream: Melancholic Misanthrope
Le rêve millénaire
Sennen no Yume: Melancholic Misanthrope
episode.summary: Rokuro is reeling from what he has learned about his past, and Head Exorcist Arima explains the full scope of what Abe no Seimei set in motion, over a thousand years ago. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 故郷は禍野 SAY IT AIN`T SO,ROKURO!
I Come from Magano: Say It Ain`t So, Rokuro!
Mon foyer est Magano
Furusato wa Magano: Say It Ain`t So, Rokuro!
episode.summary: The threat Kuranashi had posed is over, but the Twin Stars don`t get to celebrate for long when an old foe returns. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 十二天将, 墜つ! HAVE A NICE NIGHTMARE, 12GUARDIANS
The Twelve Guardians Fall! Have A Nice Nightmare, 12 Guardians
La chute des douze généraux célestes
Juuni Tenshou, Otsu! Have a Nice Nightmare, 12 Guardians
episode.summary: With the Twelve Guardians caught in Kuranashi`s trap, it`s now up to the Twin Star Exorcists to free them. But what chance do they stand against the newly powerful Basara? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 団結 SOLIDARITY
Unity: Solidarity
Solidarité
Danketsu: Solidarity
episode.summary: Abe no Seimei is about to create his perfect new world, and it means a gruesome end for the our current one. It`s up to the Twin Star Exorcists and their friends to stop him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 紅緒 POSITIVE
Benio: Positive
Benio
Benio: Positive
episode.summary: Rokuro has become the Cataclysm King, and will soon be responsible for cleansing nearly all of humanity from the Earth. Abe no Seimei offers Benio a way to turn him back to normal, but at what cost? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悠斗 DESTINY
Yuto: Destiny
Yûto
Yuuto: Destiny
episode.summary: As they battle over the fate of the world, Yuto reveals the nature of his obsession with Rokuro. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ひとりきりの二人 LONELY TWIN EXORCIST
The Couple Alone: Lonely Twin Exorcist
Le duo solitaire
Hitorikiri no Futari: Lonely Twin Exorcist
episode.summary: Rokuro has decided to fight Yuto alone. Without Benio, and with the other higher ranked exorcists out of commission, does he stand a chance? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 双星 TWINS
Twin Stars: Twins
Étoiles jumelles
Sousei: Twins
episode.summary: Abe no Seimei, the greatest Exorcist of all time, intends to wipe humanity`s yin away in order to create a world where there will be no more Kegare... or free will, or individuality. Can the Twin Star Exorcists stop him? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 復活 RESTORATION
Revival: Restoration
Résurrection
Fukkatsu: Restoration
episode.summary: Rokuro tries to rescue Benio but even if he succeeds, can the Twin Star Exorcists prevent the birth of Abe no Seimei`s new world? Source: crunchyroll
